page.title: 14PETS SURVEY
page.content:
Members of the fourth year at Dallam School,Cumbria carried out a survey into the pet keeping habits of families in the catchment area of the school.A sample of 103 families were studied by means of a questionaire.The following information was recorded:
Families with pets =86 Families without pets =17 Total persons =389 Average per family =3.78 Ratio of pets to people =1.56 : 1 Total hours a day =168 i.e. hours per family=1h 38mins " " person=26mins " " pet=17mins Total cost per week=Â£487.27 " " " family=Â£4.73 " " " person=Â£1.25 " " " pet=Â£0.81
